title: A1708 - 820 00840 Information
message:
Hey guys, 

Need to know if it's possible to access the data inside the SSD! The client forgot the password off SSD and the SSD have the icloud associate on them! 

I try to reset the password by Terminal but the machines ask me for the icloud password! 

Exist Docs to suport this SSD ?? If yes it's possible to connect in other mac to access the information ? 

Thanks
